title: What’s the best way to learn the principles of mechanics? - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume you mean Engineering Mechanics. I hated those courses when I matriculated due to the snobbish Professor who taught it and the fact that I had much of it in other courses. I suppose the best way to learn it is to either take a course or purchase a textbook on Engineering Mechanics.

There are lots of kinds of mechanics - quantum mechanics, auto mechanics, soil mechanics, bicycle mechanics, planetary mechanics, engineering mechanics, social mechanics, plant mechanics, industrial mechanics… If you provide details about what you want to do or how you’ll apply the principles, you may then get some very useful answers.
